response.summary: Chemical Engineer passionate about industrial processes planning and sustainable production methods that are environment-friendly and lead to circular economies. I have solid expertise in water treatments and non-hazardous industrial waste recovery.
response.skills: SCADA, Proactive Leadership , Residues, Sustainability, Teamwork, Investigación y desarrollo, Ingeniería química, Microsoft Office, Ingeniería medioambiental, Tratamiento de aguas residuales, Capacidad de análisis, Ingeniería de procesos, Aptitudes de laboratorio, Microsoft Excel

profile_positions.description:
Support the operations department from the scientific area in the continuous development to optimize the processes in the biological treatment of organic waste in Malta.
Manage contracts related to monitoring and testing for compliance with local and international laws and regulations
profile_positions.title: Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the operation of a wastewater treatment plant. My specific duties were supervising operating conditions, improving the efficiency of operating processes, leading teams of technicians, working with community members to reduce water contaminants, relations with environmental government protection agencies.
profile_positions.title: Wastewater Treatment Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for collecting and performing laboratory test of water samples in different locations of the municipality; preparing reports for water quality control agencies.
profile_positions.title: Water Quality Analyst

profile_positions.description: Reponsible for reseaching and developing environmental sustainability projects in the paper industry. These projects aimed to treat industrial wastewater and recover plastic waste.
profile_positions.title: Industrial Waste Treatment Engineer

profile_positions.description: Designing water and wastewater treatment plants, making project budgets, consulting for companies and municipalities across the country (Colombia).
profile_positions.title: Water Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for adapting the formulation of enamel paint for Latin American contexts. Specific duties included making invert emulsions and tracking their evolution until finding the right combination of reagents.
profile_positions.title: Research Fellow

profile_positions.description: Responsible for supporting research projects about biodiesel production from soy oil, creating databases, and supervising inventories.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant at Chemical Engineer Lab

company.name: WasteServ Malta Ltd.
company.description:
Established in November 2002 as a limited liability company, WasteServ is responsible for organising, managing and operating integrated systems for waste management. Since its creation, WasteServ has been committed to promoting waste reduction and recycling, and to establishing and maintaining innovative waste management infrastructure to protect the environment and society. 

We recognise that the linear economy approach, which involves taking resources to make products which are then used and discarded when no longer wanted, is no longer working for businesses, people and the environment. So, we want to be at the forefront of this transformative change towards a circular economy approach. This means that we are continually evaluating our operations to create value from previously wasted energy and materials. 

WasteServ will soon be home to Malta’s largest ever investment in the waste management sector, ECOHIVE, that will drive Malta towards a circular economy. WasteServ is determined to act in the most sustainable and resource-efficient way possible, by turning waste into good quality recyclable materials. In the meantime, we will continue working to make sure that recyclable items are separated into different waste streams to be recycled and returned into the economic cycle. 

Our Mission

To lead Malta’s waste management facilities and services towards a circular economy approach.
